name: The Party of Demons
description:
The Party of Demons is a high pace, competition bullet hell game. It contains well-designed bullets and awesome background music. You can even compete with your friend in this game.

  • Well-designed bullets.
  • You can compete with your friend in this game.
  • 13 original background music.
  • 14 unique characters with different magic skills.
  • 4 difficulty options. Everyone can have fun in it.
